thread.section_title: Mid-Atlantic Waterproofing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mid-Atlantic Waterproofing | www.basements.com
thread.title: Mike & Teresa
thread.title_full: Mid-Atlantic Waterproofing reviewed by Mike & Teresa

author: Mike & Teresa
title: Mike & Teresa
text:
All basement leaks stopped by Mid-Atlantic as promised.
after installation of perimeter drain / sump pump system still has water seeping through crack in foundation. Service call was made and Mid-Atlantic came and applied a carbon fiber epoxy sealant to inside wall over crack. Wall seepage stopped instantly and has not resumed. Not a drop of water anywhere in basement since. One of the best cap-improvements we have made to house since purchase in 2006.
